events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been categorized under refund due to the customer's request for money back on a wrong item.
Support agent JohnDoe has been assigned to handle the refund request from the customer.
Hello! I’m John, here to assist you with your refund request. Let’s get this sorted out quickly.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so I can verify the refund?
Sure, my order number is 12345678 and I've attached a photo showing the wrong product that arrived.
Thank you for the details. I have initiated the refund process and you should see the money back in your account within 5 to 7 business days.
Thanks for the prompt response. I appreciate you handling this quickly and look forward to the refund.
The refund has been processed successfully on our end. Please contact us if the refund does not appear in your bank within the expected timeframe.
Just checking in to confirm you have received your refund. Please let us know if there’s anything else we can assist you with.
Yes, I received the refund today. Thanks for your help throughout this process.
We’re glad your refund was completed successfully. Closing this case now, and thank you for contacting support.
